protocol_name: Targeted ballet program mitigates ataxia and improves balance in females with mild-to-moderate multiple sclerosis

description: Experimental procedural checklist. Detailed description of sample exercises with images. Example class outline for the TBP that includes chair, barre, and across the floor exercises.
protocol_affiliation: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign,Northwestern University,Murdoch University,University of Alabama at Birmingham
manuscript_citation: Scheidler AM, Kinnett-Hopkins D, Learmonth YC, Motl R, López-Ortiz C (2018) Targeted ballet program mitigates ataxia and improves balance in females with mild-to-moderate multiple sclerosis. PLoS ONE 13(10): e0205382. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0205382
keywords: Ballet, Dance, Ataxia, Multiple Sclerosis, Physical Rehabilitation, Mind-body, Art-based Rehabilitation, Balance, ICARS, Mini-BESTest
